#summary How to install Maven Bash Completion
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

Bash completion for [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven]

= Prerequisites =

Configured repository (see [HowTo]).

= Installation =

If you use cave:
{{{
cave resolve -x app-shells/maven-bashcomp
}}}

Or using emerge:
{{{
emerge -av app-shells/maven-bashcomp
}}}

The only thing left to do is to enable it:
{{{
eselect bashcomp enable maven
}}}
